DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether giving Ipilimumab at a dose of 10mg/kg will extend the lives of subjects with unresectable or metastatic melanoma more than giving Ipilimumab at a dose of 3 mg/kg
DOC.brief_title: Phase 3 Trial in Subjects With Metastatic Melanoma Comparing 3 mg/kg Ipilimumab Versus 10 mg/kg Ipilimumab
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com. Unresectable Stage III or Stage IV melanoma Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0 or 1 Brain metastases with symptoms or requiring treatment History of autoimmune disease
